name: Stalk and Trade
description: Some green things — like mint and basil — get plenty of play in cocktails, but one doesn’t see arugula very often. It’s a bright, peppery surprise in this refreshing cocktail by Brian Means of the San Francisco bar and restaurant Dirty Habit. Means advises using Krogstad aquavit here, for its assertive anise note.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 oz. aquavit (Means prefers Krogstad, for its ample anise)

recipeInstructions.text: Vigorously shake all ingredients with ice for 10 seconds. Strain into a coupe.
